name: Aurora Borealis
description: Also known as A-B, Aurora B., or simply Aurora, Aurora Borealis is a Flying Dutchmen strain resulting from a cross between a carefully selected Northern Lights #10 and a sweet Skunk #1 father. A vigorous plant with heavy resinous buds, this strain has the best attributes from both its parents. Aurora Borealis grows into a medium size plant similar to Skunk#1, and has a sweet and fruity taste with a hashy sharpness. Very high yields and a fast maturation time make this cross an ideal cash-cropper both indoors and out. The subtle, calming effects have helped this strain gain popularity in the Netherlands and Canada with its sweet, skunky flavors and earthy undertones.
descriptionPlain: Also known as A-B, Aurora B., or simply Aurora, Aurora Borealis is a Flying Dutchmen strain resulting from a cross between a carefully selected Northern Lights #10 and a sweet Skunk #1 father. A vigorous plant with heavy resinous buds, this strain has the best attributes from both its parents. Aurora Borealis grows into a medium size plant similar to Skunk#1, and has a sweet and fruity taste with a hashy sharpness. Very high yields and a fast maturation time make this cross an ideal cash-cropper both indoors and out. The subtle, calming effects have helped this strain gain popularity in the Netherlands and Canada with its sweet, skunky flavors and earthy undertones.

highlightedReviews.text: Whoa! This made me feel like I was flying up there in the Northern Lights. I found myself rocketing up, levelling off for a good time then gently gliding down. A really energizing strain, don't overindulge else you may spaz out. This with a morning coffee and your co-workers will either think you're a mad genius or just completely mad. More head than body effects. It will cheer you up, make you more talkative, erase a headache, and if you are a comedian you'll be thinking up the funniest shit. Can also make you horny as all hell. I got a boner just writing this.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Conspiracy Kush, Starfighter, Sour Jack, Aurora Borealis, and Marionberry Kush
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Another round of strains have been added to the Leafly Explorer as per your requests! We've highlighted five of our favorites, but there are plenty more to check out here. 
All right, you know what to do with these: indulge, rate, review, repeat!
   1. Conspiracy Kush
Characteristics of Conspiracy Kush:

70% indica
Cross between Obama Kush and Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Tangy citrus aroma with a peppery aftertaste
Cerebral activity followed by relaxing effects

   2. Starfighter
Characteristics of Starfighter:

60/40 indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Alien Tahoe OG and Lemon Alien Dawg
Breeder: Alien Genetics
Sweet citrus aroma
Potently uplifting effects

   3. Sour Jack
Characteristics of Sour Jack:

70% sativa
Cross between Sour Diesel and Jack Herer
Tropical, sweet aroma
Uplifting effects with a spark of energy
May help with fatigue and depression

   4. Aurora Borealis
Characteristics of Aurora Borealis:

75% indica
Cross between Northern Lights #10 with Skunk #1
Sweet, skunky aroma
May help with spasms, pain, and sleeplessness

   5. Marionberry Kush
Characteristics of Marionberry Kush:

60/40 indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Raspberry Kush and Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Passion fruit and raspberry aroma
Uplifting followed by relaxation
